Vulnerabilities: Improper input validation allowing special characters as input

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is trying to identify if any special characters are allowed as input.
StepDetails.Action: Enter various special characters as input.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker receives an error message indicating that special characters are not allowed.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is trying to understand the server's behavior and potential vulnerabilities.
StepDetails.Result: Identify that the server expects keys to be sent as a comma-separated string.

Steps.Description: Enter a single comma as input

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is testing if a single comma is allowed as input.
StepDetails.Action: Enter a single comma as input.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker receives a response containing a character set.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is attempting to fulfill the requirement of providing three keys by using three commas.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker receives a response containing a character set.

Steps.Description: Use the character set as input

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is testing if using the previously obtained character set as input will yield the flag.
StepDetails.Action: Enter the character set as input, separated by three commas.
